title: Quick for Wear DEMO
summary: Take full control of your Wear notifications!
description: Warning: This is a demo version. Only three replies allowed.Do you have an Android Wear device?Did your ever wish you didn't have to shout to it in public to reply a message?Do you prefer replying from your watch with keyboards or quick replies?This is the app for you!Your freedom is just a few taps away. Get the app, enable it and you are all set!This app currently works with:- WhatsApp- Hangouts- Gmail- Telegram- Facebook Messenger- Threema- Viber- Inbox by Gmail- Line- CloudMagic- KakaoTalkAnd will generate a full notification for those apps with:- Keyboard support- Customizable quick replies- Customizable vibration pattern- Sound supportNo root or any modification needed!Please note: Remember to block your apps from the Android Wear app, or you will get double notifications. (QFW may appear below the original notification)
descriptionHTML:
Warning: This is a demo version. Only three replies allowed.
Do you have an Android Wear device?
Did your ever wish you didn't have to shout to it in public to reply a message?
Do you prefer replying from your watch with keyboards or quick replies?


This is the app for you!


Your freedom is just a few taps away. Get the app, enable it and you are all set!
This app currently works with:
- WhatsApp
- Hangouts
- Gmail
- Telegram
- Facebook Messenger
- Threema
- Viber
- Inbox by Gmail
- Line
- CloudMagic
- KakaoTalk


And will generate a full notification for those apps with:
- Keyboard support
- Customizable quick replies
- Customizable vibration pattern
- Sound support


No root or any modification needed!


Please note: Remember to block your apps from the Android Wear app, or you will get double notifications. (QFW may appear below the original notification)
comments: Great effort Very nice idea and I love that now I can see pictures and listen to voice messages on my wear. The only issue I have is on the t9 keyboard when u want to type a word with letters from the same block it doesn't switch from one letter to another.

After much trial and error, I finally got this working...  and while I can receive messages and reply to them so long as I do so before they get dismissed, I cannot initiate messages, nor reply to messages that have been dismissed.  So 50% of the use cases for this are basically not possible.  IDK why the devs would deliberately limit their app like this.  And the alternative apps aren't any better.  I wish someone would look at Coffee's UI and functionality and use that as a model for a good wearable messaging app.    Uninstalled.

Tried on huawei watch.. can type and reply whatsapp on the watch using the app, but the reply is only sent when whatsapp is opened on the phone.. kinda defeats the purpose of the app.. thankfully tried using free demo
Works Well I use it for Facebook Messenger on my Huawei watch and I haven't had a problem
Thank you dream code!! This is very nice.please add Persian language for keyboard
Doesn't work Doesn't work on my Zenwatch 2
